title: Lion Man
description:
Hey evryone this group is for people who love lions and tigers but also appreciate Craig Bush aka The lion man!
Craig and his wife Karen are the heart and soul behind Zion Wildlife Gardens, a Large Species Feline Sanctuary located in the far north of New Zealand.
